kpi_info.title: Maximum number of MSRNs
kpi_info.use: Maximum number of MSRNs at the end of the measurement period per MSRN Groups. Note: it is possible to add/delete MSRNs during the measurement period. In this case, using the counter to calculate other KPIs (for example utilization percentage) can lead to wrong results and bigger than 100% percentages! Measured object: MSRN Group At the end of the measurement period by sampling the number of available MSRNs.
